game.name: Snowball World
game.description:
Snowball World is an awesome and fun-filled free online adventure game for kids, teens and grownups. You would surely fall in love with this extremely popular platform game especially if you have immense love for kitten/cat. This cat is so sad and feeling lonely.Your goal is to assist the kitten Snowball through electrifying 20 challenging levels in this exclusively-designed side-scroller skill game. 

Roll up your sleeves and get your eyes and hands ready to help the kitten jump over unlimited hindrances, catch birds and mice as well as gather the keys to ensure your victory in each level and progress to the advanced levels. Your determination, focus and patience will surely help you to complete all the levels of this wonderful free online game. Play the role of a snowball ? a kitten and help her to survive in a world full of life-threatening dangers. 

Excellent graphics and easy control are enough to take you a new world of online gaming. In this popular flash game, you are free to run automatically from right to left and vice versa. Just make sure that you will find the key time to move to the next level. You ca not resist yourself from playing this electrifying adventure game again and again if you play it at least once. So, what are you waiting for? Try it now to enjoy a package of unlimited fun and entertainment through a single game!
